meanings: Verb be filled with, be tinged with
A habit you acquire when you are young is hard to break even when you become old
from the time when one was a child

vlive.korean: 그거 어릴 때지만... It was when I was young though... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: It was when I was young though...

vlive.korean: 어릴 때 가장 좋아했던 장난감은? What do you envy each other most for? 듣기 View video OSEN : PENTAGON 펜타곤, 귀여운 2인 1조 TMI 인터뷰 #스타로드 05
vlive.english: What do you envy each other most for?

vlive.korean: 어릴 때 뭐하셨어요? What did you do when you were young? 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : white (feat. 막내즈) #2
vlive.english: What did you do when you were young?

vlive.korean: 더 어릴 때는 진짜 뭐 브로드웨이에서... When I was young, I saw... 듣기 View video NCT : 🎂🎂🎂
vlive.english: When I was young, I saw...

vlive.korean: 어릴 때 생각나죠? 그렇죠? It reminds you of your childhood. Right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 조곤조곤
vlive.english: It reminds you of your childhood. Right?

examples.korean: He was crippled by polio as a child. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 어릴 때 소아마비로 불구가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was crippled by polio as a child. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Adult behaviour is often patterned by childhood experiences. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 성인의 행동은 흔히 어릴 적의 경험들에 의해 양식이 형성된다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Adult behaviour is often patterned by childhood experiences. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We are profoundly affected by what happens to us in childhood. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 어릴 적 우리에게 일어나는 일의 영향을 깊이 받는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We are profoundly affected by what happens to us in childhood. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I learnt to ride as a child. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 어릴 때 승마를 배웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I learnt to ride as a child. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a chance to fulfil a childhood dream 듣기 Add to Wordbook 어릴 적 꿈을 이룰 수 있는 기회 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a chance to fulfil a childhood dream Add to Wordbook
